question: Is it permissible that I donâ€™t shave the hair on the border by my private parts?
answer:
QUESTION
Usually when shaving , there would be border to where you would stop. When I shave on this border more hair grows above it .It might carry on and on and eventually reach the navel
ANSWER


Share:
The area immediately under the navel is not to be shaven.

The area of shaving for a person (male / female) is above and around the private parts. If possible, it is commendable to shave around the hind private parts as well. (Al-Kamil, commentary of Muslim; Imam Nawawi vol.1 pg.128).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
